name: throttle
posTip: A word that refers to a person, place, idea, event or thing.

trans_examp.trans_en: a valve which allows more or less fuel to go into an engine and so changes the power with which the engine operates

name: throttle
posTip: A word that describes an action, condition or experience.

dsense.name: throttle
dsense.posTip: A word that describes an action, condition or experience.

trans_examp.trans_en: to press someone's throat very tightly so that they cannot breathe

example.eg: Sometimes he annoys me so much that I could throttle him.
example.egtrans: 有时他真让我讨厌，我恨不得掐死他。

dsense.name: throttle
dsense.posTip: A word that describes an action, condition or experience.

example.eg: The reduction in funds is throttling the development of new programmes.
example.egtrans: 经费的削减将阻碍新计划的开展。
